O jogo mostra a história do Half Life vista pelos olhos de um dos guardas da instalação de pesquisas. Tem novas áreas a serem exploradas, tem lugares semelhantes ao Half Life mas que possuem acessos alternativos, dando uma visão mais ampla do jogo e levando a salas que antes não se era possível entrar. Amplia e muito o universo HL. Vale a pena.

警備員バーニィとなり、壊滅したブラックメサからの脱出を図るHALF-LIFE外伝エピソード第二弾。

GmanのサポートやHEVスーツもある超人ゴードンくんや海兵隊と協力してエイリアンをぶちのめす現役軍人シェパードとは異なり、ただの警備員であるバーニィくんの持てる武器はMP5やマグナムのみ。ロケットランチャーもレーザーもM60もないため、終始火力不足に悩まされつつシビアな戦闘を潜り抜けることに。海兵隊が異様に強く見えます。

また第二弾なのもあり謎解きも難解。何度か攻略動画の世話になるぐらいには難しかったです。
ボリュームは比較的少なめですが初見ではかなりの時間を要しました。ここらへんは人によるかも。
また短いとはいえOFでは少なかった｢リアルタイムで展開するパニック映画界的演出｣も健在。事故直後の演出などは初代よりも緊迫感があります。

HL2へと続く｢海兵隊とエイリアンで壊滅状態のブラックメサからなぜあれほどただの研究者たちが生き残れたのか｣という疑問への答えとなる歯応えのある短編です。2のお供に。
Ana hikayeye göre çok kısa ve aşırı kolay tamamen vakit öldürmek için oynanacak bir oyun

This game depicts the life of a security guard inside Black Mesa Research Facility on THAT day. It gives you a more in-depth idea of what Barney Calhoun had to go through while Gordon was trying to get out of the facility. This was the second DLC released for the original Half-Life, and unfortunately a bit shorter than the first one, Opposing Force.
If you like the Half-Life world and story, definitely worth playing through at least once in your life.

As a game it's quite clunky by today's standards, but it has some depth so points for that. 4/10.

[h1]입대하자마자 최전방 현역으로 활동하는 칼훈의 대 모험!![/h1]
[b] * 마우스를 사용하고싶다면 마우스 옵션에서 raw mouse input을 켜야한다.[/b]

[b]1. 출시년도다운 그래픽[/b]
 - NPC 이동시의 계단현상, 랜턴의 답답한 시야, 이게 스위치인지 포스터인지 구분해내는 간단한 눈썰미 테스트 등
[b]2. 출시년도다운 서라운드[/b]
 - 사방팔방 너무나 확실한 소리의 단계적 위치, 렉걸린줄 알았던 공간계 이펙트
[b]3. 출시년도다운 부분 음성지원[/b]
 - 아주 잘하셨습니다. 메뉴만 한글인줄 알았더니 음성까지 한글지원이 되는줄 전혀 모르겠군요!
[b]4. 불친절한 퍼즐[/b]
 - 하프라이프식 뜬금없이 퍼즐을 풀어야 진행할 수 있는데 이 수준이 알바하면서 밥먹다가 사장님께 불려나가는 수준.
 - 하프라이프 특유의 구린 조작감으로 인한 스트레스는 덤

하지만 스토리에서 나름 비중이 없지는 않으니 [u]하프라이프 팬[/u]이라면 꼭 [b]플레이하기를 권장[/b]한다.

[b]Half-Life'da, Black Mesa'daki güvenlik görevlisini hatırlarsınız. Blue Shift ile o güvenlik görevlilerinden birisinin yerine geçiyor, Gordon Freeman'ın sıradışı macerasını Barney Calhoun'un gözünden görüyoruz. Grafikler ve mekanikler Half-Life ile tamamiyle aynı. Ufak eklentiler ve değişiklikler dışında tek fark senaryosu. Half-Life'ı bitirdiyseniz mutlaka başlamanız gereken bir yapım. Denemenizi kesinlikle tavsiye ederim.

Daha fazla inceleme için;
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/28040015[/b]

The life of a security guard in Black Mesa Research Facility on that very special day.

But it's still the Half-Life world, and i love every bit of it. This was also a story i didn't get to play through as a child when it was new.

J'ai relancé le jeu en 2019, alors on ne va pas se mentir, les graphismes font très old school aujourd'hui.
Par contre, cela se termine (en 6 heures avec l'aide d'internet pour certains passages) et le jeu a le mérite de faire revivre les mécaniques du 1er Half-Life.
Si vous êtes nostalgique du 1er Half Life et que vous voulez prolonger l'aventure, c'est un peu le but de ce jeu donc vous êtes sur la bonne voie si vous souhaitez vous y (re)mettre.

Half-Life: Blue Shift jest całkiem dobrą grą do dziś.  Skończenie zajmuje kilka godzin. Świetna, wciągająca akcja, rewelacyjny klimat, fabuła ciekawie poprowadzona. 
Blue Shift kontynuuje wszystkie dobre tradycje do których przyzwyczaiła nas seria Half-Life, jednocześnie dając możliwość spojrzenia na akcję z zupełnie nowej perspektywy.

Alors... Ce jeu est et restera injouable, tant que vous n'aurez pas ouvert la console en jeu, pour entrer la commande "m_rawinput1", et si un autre joueur n'avait pas rendu service à bien d'autres (dont moi) en communicant cette info, ce jeu serait absolument inutilisable en l'état.
DONC, une fois que vous avez validé la commande, vérifiez... ça ne marche toujours pas ! C'est normal : c'est Valve ! -_-
Du coup, la commande a quand même servi à rajouter une option dans le menu des options de jeu, onglet "souris". Cochez-la, cliquez sur Appliquer, avant de revenir au jeu... Et là, ça marche ! Il a fallu que ce soit un mec qui donne anonymement la solution (à mon avis un joueur) alors que Valve semblait ne pas savoir comment le résoudre.
Pour info', à une époque j'avais les jeux du "bundle", en version physique, matérielle. Alors bon, payer 11€ pour les ravoir sur steam, ok, pas grand chose après tout, mais si en 2005 les jeux fonctionnaient à merveille, et que 15ans + tard il faut faire des manip' pour "débuguer" les jeux, afin qu'ils soient de nouveau jouables... Il faudrait m'expliquer un truc, là ! Parce que si ma mémoire est bonne, ce sont les mecs de Valve, qui ont fait les jeux de ce bundle, qui ont par la suite crée Steam :)
Voila, donc est-ce que je le recommande à présent ? Pfff...Oui. Mais je persiste à dire qu'effectuer des manip' dans la console et le menu des options, pour pouvoir simplement jouer à un jeu aussi simple que celui-ci, ça ne fait pas pro' du tout, surtout quand on a en mémoire qu'ils marchaient impeccablement 15 ans auparavant !
Enfin, après ce bon coup de gueule, j'admet que le plaisir est toujours là, même en 2019. Un bon amusement et surtout un bon défouloir.

Not as great as Half-Life: Opposing Force, but still very enjoyable – diverse levels, engaging story – but overall nothing new (no new weapons or enemies).

What surprised me was some puzzles primarily based on manipulation of several objects, although the GoldSrc engine has virtually no support for physical simulation. These puzzles were therefore frustrating (boxes and barrels flying in all directions, just not where I wanted them). Like physical simulation, the GoldSrc engine is not very good at AI. It took me a lot of work to bring Dr. Rosenberg to the elevator, because he just didn’t want to follow me on such a long distance (for example, he suddenly decided to return across the whole level to his starting position).

In contrast to Half-Life: Opposing Force, I was pleased with higher default FOV and higher sound quality.

With the exceptions mentioned above, I enjoyed the game and I can recommend it.

The shorter of the two Half-Life 1 expansions (at about 3 hours playtime), this instalment lets you see the catastrophe from Barney Calhoun perspective, he is a Level 3 Security Guard working for the Black Mesa Security Force. Things soon go wrong as your run along side the events of Half-Life 1 and ultimately must fight to escape the facility. Although fun, it is significantly shorter than Opposing Force and contains a little bit less to do in general, also the weapons available to Barney are limited. Worth playing if you are a fan of the Half-Life universe or classic FPS titles, I wouldn't say this is absolutely necessary for everyone to experience but most will enjoy this!

О, а вот это уже на уровне оригинальной Халвы.
Меньше оружия, меньше врагов, нового толком ничего, разве что чуть-чуть поменяли механику брони. В этом игра проигрывает Opposing Force, это факт.
Но вот что делает её лучше в этом сравнении... Так это внятная небольшая история про нескольких уцелевших работников комплекса, которые хотят сбежать оттуда и не возвращаться.
Пока там в оригинальной игре Гордон Фримен спасает мир, тут мы наблюдаем за простыми людьми которые хотят всего-то выжить. Добавьте к этому то, что игра абсолютно не затянута, и получите замечательное дополнение к оригиналу!
Однако рекомендовать купить её за полную цену всё ещё могу только фанатам. Но даже если вы им не являеетесь - попробуйте, может того и гляди понравится.
Не потянуло новое отражение от пола.((((((((((((

A very short expansion for Half-Life. While it is not as fresh and original as Half-Life: Opposing Force or Half-Life, its still an alright game. None of the encounters are very challenging, no new weapons or enemies and an escort mission that if you walk 10 feet ahead of him, he stops moving. I'd only play/buy it if you are big on the Half-Life experience.
